query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS monitor_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  metric_value DOUBLE,
  tags JSON,
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HmF555sZ6wXsVo.885fbf394348 --database cSZcQBnZuHpLU79S85jppV --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS monitor_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  metric_value DOUBLE,
  tags JSON,
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
